edu.teco.smartlambda.rest.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.teco.smartlambda.rest.controller.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends Object
    Provides REST calls related to user account handling.

    • Method Detail

      • getUserList

        public static Object getUserList(spark.Request request,
                                 spark.Response response)
        GET /users

        Lists users that are visible to the current user. No body parameters are required. Responds with a list of user name strings.

        Throws:
        NotAuthenticatedException - 401 Thrown when user is not properly authenticated

      • register

        public static Object register(spark.Request request,
                              spark.Response response)
                       throws IOException
        POST /register

        Registers a new user.

        Response values
        Name Description
        name Name of the newly registered user
        primaryKey The primary key of the registered user, which may be used for future authentication


        Request parameters
        Name Type Description Required
        identityProvider enum("null", "github") Identity provider to use for registration. See table below for further information. Yes
        parameters object Parameters to pass to the selected identity provider. See table below for further information. Yes


        Identity providers
        Name Description Required parameters Implementation
        null Simple identity provider that allows registration of any user name without external identification.
        name User name
        		NullIdentityProvider
        github Identity provider that uses GitHub accounts for identification.
        accessToken GitHub personal access token
        		GitHubIdentityProvider
        Throws:
        IOException
